title: Anne Boleyn and the Zombie Apocalypse
description: A modern retelling of Anne Boleyn...It all started with a simple bite.Anne Boleyn woke on the eve of her 16th birthday expecting a small gathering with her father Thomas and her sister Mary and archery hunting in the woods behind their home.What she got was a country ravaged by fire and death. Her mother eaten in half on the kitchen floor. Her sister and father infected and hunting her down with the rest of the walkers.And a group of teens hellbent on survival - the Druggie Marquess of Pembroke, DJ Henry, Martial Arts expert Jane Seymour, and Zombie lover Catherine of Aragon.In a world now in turmoil and ruin, Anne must learn to survive the Zombie Apocalypse... or become one of them herself.
author: Carina King
